summary: An email from an FBI agent in the New York Field Office to an unspecified recipient, requesting assistance with interview space in Farmington for a victim interview related to the Epstein/Maxwell case. The interview is scheduled for April 13, 2021, and the victim has relocated from an unspecified original location.

persons.name: FBI Agent (NY Field Office)
persons.context: The sender of the email, working the Epstein/Maxwell case out of New York, is coordinating travel and an in-person interview with a victim.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as part of the case name (Epstein/Maxwell case) being worked by the FBI agent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as part of the case name (Epstein/Maxwell case) being worked by the FBI agent.

persons.name: Unnamed Victim
persons.context: A victim in the Epstein/Maxwell case who has agreed to an in-person interview with the FBI on April 13, 2021, and has relocated from an original location.

persons.name: Unnamed Contact (Durango Office)
persons.context: A person from the Durango office who referred the FBI agent to the email recipient as the right person to contact for interview space assistance.

persons.name: Unnamed Prior Coordinator
persons.context: Someone the FBI agent was previously coordinating travel with for the victim, before the victim indicated a preference for a location closer to her current stay.

connections.description: Linked together as the subjects of the criminal case (Epstein/Maxwell case) being investigated by the FBI.
The FBI agent is arranging an interview with the victim as part of the ongoing investigation.
The Durango office contact referred the FBI agent to the email recipient for assistance with interview space.

events.title: Scheduled FBI Victim Interview
events.description: An in-person interview is scheduled between the FBI and a victim in the Epstein/Maxwell case, potentially extending to the following day.

events.title: Email Coordination for Interview Space
events.description: An FBI agent emails an unspecified recipient to request the use of an interview space in Farmington to facilitate a victim interview.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively conducting victim interviews in the Epstein/Maxwell case as of April 2021.
A victim in the case had relocated and required coordination for an in-person interview scheduled for April 13, 2021.
The FBI New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit was involved in this investigative activity.
The communication shows inter-office coordination (Durango office referral) to secure local interview space for a witness.
